Jazz, the American Invention #4: The Big Band - Thad Jones-Mel Lewis Orchestra, Dee Dee Bridgewater
Jazz, the American Invention #4: The Big Band - Thad Jones-Mel Lewis Orchestra, Dee Dee Bridgewater

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes AV2904: "Majority of content features a big band performance directed by Les McCann, with several establishing shots in the beginning. A persistent skew error is present in the bottom half of the frame throughout, with some portions more severe than others. This error was less problematic than errors introduced by other TBCs. Otherwise the content plays well, with one instance of momentary sync error, and one instance of minor tape damage. Occasional ghosting and inherent exposure adjustments throughout. Head switch error visible throughout. Mild audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."

Transfer Technician Notes AV2905: "Content plays well throughout. A persistent skew error affecting the bottom half of the frame is visible throughout, and contributes to moderate bearding. Mild to moderate ghosting and tube burn visible, especially following swift movement. Mild head switch error visible throughout. Content ends abruptly at tail."
